EmailTemplate.name: 22AugWeb-Digital-Strategies.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, don't forget to register for MBO's Tech webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don't forget; there's still time to join us on August 22 at 1 p.m. ET for a webinar titled "Digital Strategies for Independent Professionals: How the Right Tech Tools Can Boost Your Bottom Line <http://info.mbopartners.com/22AugWebDigitalStrategies_RegistrationPage.html> <http://info.mbopartners.com/16MayWebSocialMedia_RegistrationPage.html>."
Tech columnist and founder of Brand Camp University Hajj Flemings will show you the apps and technology you need to boost your brand and bring your consultancy up to speed. Remember, even if you can't make our webinar, if you register <http://info.mbopartners.com/22AugWebDigitalStrategies_RegistrationPage.html>, we will send you a recording and slides the next week so you can view when you have the time. ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
